subject: Refund
description_text:
Hi to whole this may concern, I would like to place a refund for order SSN6203,
I have yet to receive the product.

conversations.body_text: Hi Josh Kossek,  Due to product upgrades, this item has been out of stock for two weeks. Once the upgrades are complete, we will ship the latest version to you as soon as possible to enhance your experience. We expect to ship within the next few days. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
